text: Gregory Daniel Davies (born 14 May 1968) is a British stand-up comedian and actor. He is best known for his roles as Greg in We Are Klang, Mr Gilbert in The Inbetweeners, Ken Thompson in Cuckoo, the Taskmaster in Taskmaster and Dan Davies in Man Down. He has made guest appearances in panel shows such as Mock the Week and Would I Lie to You?. For his role in Cuckoo, Davies was nominated for the BAFTA Television Award for Best Male Comedy Performance in 2013. Davies was born in St Asaph, Denbighshire, Wales. He grew up in Wem, Shropshire, England. Davies is noted for his height, standing tall. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:British stand-up comedians Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:People from Shropshire Category:People from Flintshire Category:Welsh comedians Category:Welsh television actors
title: Greg Davies
